member.name: M:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.GenerateIdentity
member.summary: Generates a single identity base on defined settings.

member.name: M:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.GenerateIdentities(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates multiple identities base on defined settings.

member.name: P:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.IncludeSSN
member.summary: Includes SSN in identity generation (default: true)

member.name: P:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.IncludeDOB
member.summary: Includes Date Of Birth in identity generation (default: true)

member.name: P:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.IncludeAddress
member.summary: Includes Address (address line, city, state, zipcode) in identity generation (default: true)

member.name: P:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.IncludeMale
member.summary: Includes Male names in identity generation (default: true)

member.name: P:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.IncludeFemale
member.summary: Includes Female in identity generation (default: true)

member.name: P:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.MinimumAge
member.summary: The minimum age use for random ages in identity generation (default: 1)

member.name: P:EfficientlyLazy.IdentityGenerator.IGenerator.MaximumAge
member.summary: The maximum age use for random ages in identity generation (default: 100)
